snippet: Russian President Vladimir Putin said on Friday there were some problems with sports doping in Russia, but that there was no state-sponsored doping system as critics have alleged....
lead_paragraph: Russian President Vladimir Putin said on Friday there were some problems with sports doping in Russia, but that there was no state-sponsored doping system as critics have alleged.

headline.main: Putin Says There Is No State-Supported Doping System in Russia
headline.print_headline: Putin Says There Is No State-Supported Doping System in Russia
